name: Zhongli
title: Vago Mundo
description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Rain of Stone
skills.description: Normal AttackPerforms up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.Charged AttackConsumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path.Plunging AttackPlunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between.PressCommands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele.HoldCauses nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects:·If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele.·Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP.·Deals AoE Geo DMG.·If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG.Stone SteleWhen created, deals AoE Geo DMG.Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents.The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks.Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time.Jade ShieldPossesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG.Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.
skills.info: A true master of stone may carve jade and shape gold.

skills.name: Planet Befall
skills.description: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them.PetrificationOpponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.
skills.info: The falling meteor punishes the unjust.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Rain of Stone
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between. Press Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele. Hold Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects: ·If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele. ·Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP. ·Deals AoE Geo DMG. ·If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG. Stone Stele When created, deals AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time. Jade Shield Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG. Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.
skills.info: A true master of stone may carve jade and shape gold.

skills.name: Planet Befall
skills.description: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.
skills.info: The falling meteor punishes the unjust.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Rain of Stone
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between. Press Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele. Hold Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects: ·If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele. ·Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP. ·Deals AoE Geo DMG. ·If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG. Stone Stele When created, deals AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time. Jade Shield Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG. Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.
skills.info: A true master of stone may carve jade and shape gold.

skills.name: Planet Befall
skills.description: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.
skills.info: The falling meteor punishes the unjust.

passives.name: Resonant Waves
passives.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:·Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

passives.name: Dominance of Earth
passives.description: Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:·Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.·Dominus Lapidis' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.·Planet Befall's DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

passives.name: Arcanum of Crystal
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Polearm-type weapons.

passives.name: Resonant Waves
passives.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify: ·Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength. Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.description: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.description: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

outfits.name: Hermit of Mortal Life
outfits.description: Zhongli's outfit. This is the leisurewear of choice for Zhongli, the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's consultant.
